item.title: ECOM6013 Emerging and Disruptive Technologies, IoT and AI
item.description: Disruptive Technologies E-commerce is evolving the technologies will either evolve or have a limited lifespan a challenge is to determine what new technologies are relevant and what they might contribute to the future especially of e-commerce definition of technology the application of science, math, engineering, art, and other fields of knowledge to create tools and implementations deemed useful by a society Adoption of disruptive technologies

item.title: ECOM7121 AI Smart City Innovation Lab
item.description: Raising Cash for Your Venture bootstrapping vs external capital debt vs equity equity investors — angels, super-angels, VCs, strategic investors crowdfunding and JOBS act of 2012 three kinds of crowdfunding non-equity rewards crowdfunding i.e. Kickstarter SEC-registered crowdfunding i.e. AngelList, Wefunding regulation D crowdfunding — 2000 investor limit accelerators i.e. Ycombinator, StartupsHK Crowdfunding Platforms overview discovery, auction, timing deadlines, peer champions does it work Smart City Overview
